summary: adds 4 redone Greatswords with the power of the BloodSkal
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54919-1-1402883249.jpg[/IMG]

**** Both Dragonborn and Dawnguard are required for this mod to work****

~~~~~~~~~
Description
~~~~~~~~~
Fancy yourself a warrior? Well, what's a warrior without proper equipment?
Power Greatswords is a mod that ADDS 4 new (stand-alone) two-handed swords to your game.

***All of the weapons are non-replacers***

~~~~~~~~~
What should you expect?
~~~~~~~~~
- Complete custom meshes.
- Complete custom textures.
- Custom glow map for each of the swords, each with it's own color.
- All the swords have the same effect the Blood Skaal sword has.

~~~~~~~~~
The Weapons
~~~~~~~~~
1-Big Blue Greatsword: Inspired by the harsh climate of Skyrim. Quite a fair amount of detail has been put into the texture of this sword's Ice-resembling textures (blue glow).

2-BloodNord Blade: Inspired by the Nordic tradition of sword-making and engraved with glowing runes. The design of this sword is elegant, yet intimidating, and the (red glow) is just the icing on the cake with this one.

3-Dragon Greatsword: Inspired by Dwemer weapon-making art, this sword is what warriors of great caliper would consider a true weapon. The (red glow) on the handle and cross-guard of this sword will be the last thing your enemies ever see!

4-Blue Night Greatsword: The inspiration to this sword comes from magic. With it's (purple glow) and crystal sharp edges, this sword is a great fit for any mighty dragon-slayer.

~~~~~~~~~
Location
~~~~~~~~~
You will find the swords at the following locations:

-Big Blue Greatsword, BloodNord Blade, and Blue Night Greatsword will all be located in Anises Basement (the cabin in the woods near Riverwood)

-Dragon Greatsword: You'll find this sword at the top of the Throat of the World.

~~~~~~~~~
Bugs and incompatibilities
~~~~~~~~~
-None that I am aware of. Please report any bugs you find.

~~~~~~~~~
Install
~~~~~~~~~
*NMM recommended*

Manual install:
-Drag all files into Skyrim's data folder.
-Activate (Check) "PowerGreatswords.esp" in Skyrim Launcher or NMM

~~~~~~~~~
Uninstall
~~~~~~~~~
*NMM Uninstall recommended*

Manual uninstall:

-Deactivate (Uncheck) "PowerGreatswords.esp" in Skyrim Launcher or NMM.
-Delete the following files:
- SkyrimDataPowerGreatswords.esp file
- SkyrimDatameshesweaponsFZ_DragonGreatsword folder
- SkyrimDatameshesdlc02weaponsstahlrimFZstahlrimgreatsword.nif file
- SkyrimDatameshesdlc02weaponsnordicFZBloodNordBlade.nif file
- SkyrimDatameshesdlc01weaponsdragonboneFZgreatsword.nif file
- SkyrimDatameshesdlc01weaponsdragonboneFZ1stpersongreatsword.nif file
- SkyrimDatatexturesweaponsFZ_DragonGreatsword folder
- SkyrimDatatexturesdlc02weaponsstahlrimFZStahlrim folder
- SkyrimDatatexturesdlc02weaponsnordicFZsword_tall folder
- SkyrimDatatexturesdlc01weaponsdragonboneFZDragon folder
- SkyrimDataScriptsfzbloodnordbladescript.pex file

~~~~~~~~~
Future updates
~~~~~~~~~
- Might make custom attack glow colors to match swords.
- Possible location changes.
author: Forzane
